m_szDocTitle: Chevrolet Bolt EV To Be Developed Through Strategic Partnership Between GM And LG
m_szDocSumamry: Ã— LG Electronics DETROIT, Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- General Motors set aside traditional vehicle development in selecting LG Electronics as its partner in developing the next generation Chevrolet Bolt EV (electric vehicle), which can travel more than 200 miles on a single electric charge. Offering consumers the first long-range, affordable EV required an unprecedented supplier relationship combining expertise in infotainment, battery systems and component development with GM's proven in-house capabilities in electric motor design, battery control, system validation and vehicle body/system
